snippets.fk-appbarsection:title: ${1:Title}
snippets.fk-appbar:title: ${3:App Name}
snippets.fk-autocomplete:filter:
<AutoComplete 
	placeholder="${1:Search the fruits!}" 
	:dataItems="${2:['Apples', 'Bananas', 'Oranges', 'Pears', 'Pineapple']}" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	:filterOperator="${3:FilterOperator.Contains}" 
	@change="${4:console.log('change event called')}">
</AutoComplete>
snippets.fk-buttongroup:
<ButtonGroup>
	<Button 
	:togglable="true"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium"
	>${1:Button 1}
</Button>
	<Button 
	:togglable="true"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium"
	>${2:Button 2}
</Button>
	<Button 
	:togglable="true"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium"
	>${3:Button 3}
</Button>
</ButtonGroup>
snippets.fk-card:full:
${3:Title} ${4:This is the subtitle.}

${5:lorem}

 ${6:Footer} ${7:}
snippets.fk-chiplist:
<ChipList 
	size="medium"
	rounded="full"
	:dataItems="Array('Boston', 'Paris', 'London', 'Buenos Aires', 'Belfast').map((item, index) => ({ text: item, value: item }))" 
/>
snippets.fk-chiplist:single:
<ChipList 
	selection="single"
	size="medium"
	rounded="full"
	:dataItems="Array('Boston', 'Paris', 'London', 'Buenos Aires', 'Belfast').map((item, index) => ({ text: item, value: item }))" 
/>
snippets.fk-chiplist:multi:
<ChipList 
	selection="multiple"
	size="medium"
	rounded="full"
	:dataItems="Array('Boston', 'Paris', 'London', 'Buenos Aires', 'Belfast').map((item, index) => ({ text: item, value: item }))" 
/>
snippets.fk-datepicker:
<DatePicker 
	label="${1:Select a date}" 
	:defaultValue="new Date()" 
	:defaultShow="${2:false}"
	:style="{ width: '258px' }" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	size="medium" 
/>
snippets.fk-datepicker:weeknum:
<DatePicker 
	label="${1:Select a date}" 
	:defaultValue="new Date()" 
	:defaultShow="${2:false}"
	:weekNumber="true" 
	:style="{ width: '285px' }" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	size="medium" 
/>
snippets.fk-drawer:
<Drawer 
	position="${1:end}" 
	mode="${2:overlay}" 
	:animation="true" 
	:expanded="true" 
	:width="${4:300}" 
	:items="[{ text: 'My Profile' },{ text: 'Settings' },{ text: 'Help' }].map((item, index) => ({ text: item.text })) "
 />
snippets.fk-dropdownbutton:
<DropDownButton 
	text="${1:Menu}"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="outline"
	rounded="medium"
	:items="['My Profile', 'Settings', 'Sign Out']" 
/>
snippets.fk-dropdownlist:
<DropDownList 
	:dataItems="['Baseball', 'Basketball', 'Football', 'Golf', 'Tennis']" 
	label="Favorite sport" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	size="medium" 
	:style="{ width: '30em' }" 
/>
snippets.fk-floatingactionbutton:
<FloatingActionButton
	:align="{horizontal: 'end', vertical: 'bottom'}"
	:alignOffset="{ x:60, y:60}"
	:svgIcon="menuIcon"
	fillMode="solid"
	themeColor="primary"
	@click="${4:console.log('clicked')}"
	:items="[{ text: 'Profile' }, { text: 'Settings' }, { text: 'Sign Out' }]" 
/>
snippets.fk-grid:
<Grid 
	:dataItems="[{ id: 1, name: 'Jane Doe', age: 30, smoker: true, city: 'New York'},{ id: 2, name: 'Tom Brown', age: 45, smoker: false, city: 'Paris'},{ id: 3, name: 'Linda Brown', age: 35, smoker: true, city: 'Belfast'},]"
	:columns="[{ field: 'name', title: 'Name', width: '200px' },{ field: 'age', title: 'Age', width: '100px' },{ field: 'smoker', title: 'Smoker', width: '100px' },{ field: 'city', title: 'City', width: '200px'}]"
	:resizable="true" 
	:reorderable="true" 
	:sortable="true" 
	:sort="[{ field: 'name', dir: 'asc'}]" 
	@columnreorder="() => console.log('invoke local columnReorder fn')"
	@sortchange="() => console.log('invoke local sortChange fn')"
/>
snippets.fk-maskedtextbox:phone:
<MaskedTextBox 
	label="${1:Enter phone number}"
	mask="${2:(999) 000-0000}" 
	placeholder="(___) ___-____" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
/>
snippets.fk-maskedtextbox:ssn:
<MaskedTextBox 
	label="${1:Enter SSN}"
	mask="${2:000-00-0000}" 
	placeholder="___-__-____" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
/>
snippets.fk-multiselect:
<MultiSelect 
	label="${1:Pizza Toppings (component label)}" 
	textField="${2:text}" 
	valueField="${3:value}" 
	placeholder="" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	:dataItems="Array('Garlic', 'Cheese', 'Pepperoni', 'Onions', 'Peppers').map((item, index) => ({ text: item, value: index }))" 
	:style="{ width: '40em' }"
 />
snippets.fk-multiselect:ext:
<Label>${1:Label}</Label>
<MultiSelect 
	textField='${2:text}' 
	valueField='${3:value}' 
	placeholder="" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	:dataItems="Array('Apples', 'Bananas', 'Oranges', 'Pears', 'Pineapples').map((item, index) => ({ text: item, value: index }))"
 />
<Hint>${4:Hint}</Hint>
snippets.fk-numerictextbox:
<NumericTextBox 
	label="${1:Years of service}" 
	placeholder="${2:Enter a number}" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	format="n0" 
/>
snippets.fk-radiogroup:
<RadioGroup
	labelPlacement="after" 
	layout="horizontal" 
	:dataItems="['Option 1', 'Option 2', 'Option 3'].map((item, index) => ({ label: item, value: index }))" 
/>
snippets.fk-splitbutton:
<SplitButton 
	text="${1:Send}"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="outline"
	rounded="medium"
	:items="[${2:'Save Draft', 'Forward to...', 'Delete'}]" 
/>
snippets.fk-splitbutton:primary:
<SplitButton 
	text="${1:Send}"
	themeColor="primary"
	fillMode="solid"
	rounded="medium"
	:items="[${2:'Save Draft', 'Forward to...', 'Delete'}]" 
/>
snippets.fk-svgicon:
<SvgIcon size="${1:medium}" :icon="${2:menuIcon}" />
<!-- import { SvgIcon } from "@progress/kendo-vue-common" -->
<!-- import { menuIcon } from "@progress/kendo-vue-icons" -->
snippets.fk-textarea:
<Label>${1:Comments}:</Label>
<TextArea 
	:rows="${2:5}"
	placeholder="${3:Enter your comments}" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	size="medium" 
/>
<Hint>${4:Hint goes here. (optional)}</Hint>
snippets.fk-textbox:
<TextBox 
	label="${1:First Name}"
	placeholder="${2:Enter your first name}" 
	fillMode="outline" 
	rounded="medium" 
	size="medium" 
/>
